About BOOM




What do you want to know?

Wellcom to BOOM website, I am Parastoo, a FullStack developer. All components in this website are written by me. BOOM offers you different services in the feild of AI.



A number of tools on this page works by AI. Such as IMAGE-GENERATOR, I will do my best to add more AI tools to the site.

In addition you can use another practical tools for Images in BOOM For instance you can resize and compress your photos. I will do my best to add more tools to the site.

Sign up in BOOM. I will put more practical tools in future. Sign up fore more news!
